channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Navigating Loops Of Artificial And Natural Perception
item.description: The cycle that links our natural and artificial intelligences can either elevate human potential and well-being (virtuous) or degrade them (vicious). ...

item.title: Nintendo Released New Footage Of ‘Wind Waker’ Running On Switch 2
item.description: Nintendo released new footage for The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker on Switch 2 and it looks pretty great.

item.title: A Tabletop Games Gift Guide For Geeky Moms On Mother’s Day
item.description: Check out these games to play with Mom on her special day ranging from a classic dungeon crawl to a supernatural soap opera.
